creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: one long line of calligraphy (14 characters); signature center L edge; light mauve mount
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, and Seals

[ 夜船燈火漁家雨秋枕涛殸僧榻風 ] (Light from a lamp at night in a boat -- / rain over the fisherman\'s home; / Sound of waves from an autumn pillow -- / wind over the Buddhist monk\'s bed!) (SA)
markings: URC; L center: [ 小釣雪] {Shōchōsetsu}; [  池桐孫印] (Chitōson in);  [ 半槁半隠 ] (Hankō han’in)
title: Single-line Calligraphy
